speech:
KIET PLACEMENTS

• A fully Flexible Choice-Based Credit System allows each student to design their program to get major, minor and honors degrees of their choice

• Academic credit sharing with study abroad under twinning programs in collaboration with internationally reputed Universities.

• 700+ placement offers from 58 companies in 2020-21 Academic Year with the highest package of 8 Lakhs per annum

• 400+ faculty with rich industry, academia, and research experience.

• We are having internship program with Ineuron , Talentio and IBM.
